efforts.name: Production Infrastructure
efforts.description: Design and implement robust production infrastructure

tasks.title: ⭐ Design infrastructure architecture
tasks.description: Plan infrastructure architecture for scalability and reliability. Consider high availability, disaster recovery, and multi-region deployment.

tasks.title: Evaluate infrastructure options
tasks.description: Compare cloud providers and on-premise options. Consider cost, performance, compliance, and operational complexity.

tasks.title: Plan capacity and scaling
tasks.description: Estimate capacity needs and plan for scaling. Design auto-scaling strategies and capacity planning processes.

tasks.title: Design security architecture
tasks.description: Plan security architecture. Include authentication, authorization, encryption, network security, and data protection.

tasks.title: Plan disaster recovery
tasks.description: Design disaster recovery strategy. Plan for backups, replication, failover, and recovery procedures.

tasks.title: Document architecture decisions
tasks.description: Document architecture decisions and rationale. Create architecture diagrams and decision records.

tasks.title: ⭐ Provision infrastructure
tasks.description: Set up infrastructure resources using infrastructure as code. Configure networks, storage, compute, and load balancers.

tasks.title: Implement monitoring and alerting
tasks.description: Set up comprehensive monitoring. Configure metrics, logs, traces, and alerts for critical issues.

tasks.title: Configure backup and recovery
tasks.description: Set up backup and disaster recovery procedures. Test recovery processes regularly to ensure they work.

tasks.title: Implement security controls
tasks.description: Configure security controls: firewalls, access controls, encryption, and security monitoring.

tasks.title: Set up CI/CD for infrastructure
tasks.description: Automate infrastructure changes through CI/CD. Use infrastructure as code and automated testing.

tasks.title: Document infrastructure
tasks.description: Document infrastructure architecture and procedures. Keep documentation current and accessible.

tasks.title: ⭐ Set up operations procedures
tasks.description: Define operational procedures and runbooks. Train team on procedures and establish on-call rotation.

tasks.title: Implement change management
tasks.description: Establish change management process. Track and review infrastructure changes with proper approvals.

tasks.title: Monitor and optimize
tasks.description: Continuously monitor infrastructure. Optimize for cost and performance based on usage patterns.

tasks.title: Plan for growth
tasks.description: Plan infrastructure growth. Anticipate future needs and scale accordingly. Review capacity regularly.

tasks.title: Conduct regular reviews
tasks.description: Schedule regular infrastructure reviews. Assess performance, costs, security, and identify improvements.

tasks.title: Maintain disaster recovery
tasks.description: Regularly test disaster recovery procedures. Update plans based on infrastructure changes and lessons learned.

tasks.title: ⭐ Conduct security assessment
tasks.description: Perform comprehensive security assessment. Identify vulnerabilities, risks, and security gaps in infrastructure.

tasks.title: Implement network security
tasks.description: Configure network security: firewalls, VPNs, network segmentation, and DDoS protection.

tasks.title: Set up identity and access management
tasks.description: Implement IAM with role-based access control. Use least privilege principle and regular access reviews.

tasks.title: Configure encryption
tasks.description: Enable encryption for data at rest and in transit. Use strong encryption algorithms and manage keys securely.

tasks.title: Implement security monitoring
tasks.description: Set up security monitoring and SIEM. Detect threats, anomalies, and security incidents in real-time.

tasks.title: Create security incident response
tasks.description: Document incident response procedures. Define roles, escalation paths, and communication plans.

projects.name: Compliance Management
projects.description: Ensure compliance with regulations and standards

tasks.title: ⭐ Identify compliance requirements
tasks.description: Determine applicable regulations: GDPR, HIPAA, SOC 2, ISO 27001, or industry-specific requirements.

tasks.title: Assess compliance gaps
tasks.description: Evaluate infrastructure against compliance requirements. Identify gaps and create remediation plans.

tasks.title: Implement compliance controls
tasks.description: Put controls in place to meet compliance requirements. Document how controls address each requirement.

tasks.title: Set up audit logging
tasks.description: Enable comprehensive audit logging. Track all access, changes, and activities for compliance reporting.

tasks.title: Create compliance documentation
tasks.description: Document compliance approach and evidence. Prepare materials for audits and certifications.

tasks.title: Plan compliance monitoring
tasks.description: Establish process for ongoing compliance monitoring. Schedule regular reviews and updates.

tasks.title: ⭐ Benchmark performance
tasks.description: Establish performance baselines. Measure response times, throughput, and resource utilization under load.

tasks.title: Identify performance bottlenecks
tasks.description: Analyze system performance to identify bottlenecks. Use profiling tools and monitoring data.

tasks.title: Optimize resource allocation
tasks.description: Right-size resources and optimize allocation. Remove unused resources and optimize for actual workload patterns.

tasks.title: Implement caching strategies
tasks.description: Add caching layers to reduce load. Cache frequently accessed data and computation results.

tasks.title: Optimize database performance
tasks.description: Tune database configurations, indexes, and queries. Optimize for your specific workload patterns.

tasks.title: Monitor and iterate
tasks.description: Continuously monitor performance metrics. Iterate on optimizations based on real-world usage.

tasks.title: ⭐ Analyze infrastructure costs
tasks.description: Review infrastructure spending in detail. Break down costs by service, project, and team member.

tasks.title: Identify cost savings
tasks.description: Find opportunities to reduce costs. Look for unused resources, over-provisioned services, and better pricing options.

tasks.title: Implement cost controls
tasks.description: Set up budgets, alerts, and spending limits. Prevent unexpected cost overruns.

tasks.title: Optimize resource usage
tasks.description: Right-size instances and optimize resource allocation. Use reserved instances and spot instances where appropriate.

tasks.title: Create cost reports
tasks.description: Generate regular cost reports. Track spending trends and share with stakeholders.

tasks.title: Establish cost policies
tasks.description: Create policies for infrastructure spending. Set approval processes and spending limits.
